items.name: static let crop: CIImageAutoAdjustmentOption
items.desc: A key used to specify whether to return a filter that crops the image to focus on detected features.

items.name: static let enhance: CIImageAutoAdjustmentOption
items.desc: A key used to specify whether to return enhancement filters.

items.name: static let features: CIImageAutoAdjustmentOption
items.desc: A key used to specify an array of features that you want to apply enhancement and red eye filters to.

items.name: static let level: CIImageAutoAdjustmentOption
items.desc: A key used to specify whether to return a filter that rotates the image to keep a level perspective.

items.name: static let redEye: CIImageAutoAdjustmentOption
items.desc: A key used to specify whether to return a red eye filter.
